title: Eggplant, Spinach & Lentil Curry

ingredients.content: ½ oz fresh ginger, peeled, sliced (⅛ in.)
1 heaping tbsp curry powder, or to taste
16 oz fresh Roma tomatoes, diced (½ in.)

preparations.content: Place cilantro into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place onions, garlic, ginger, chili, mustard seeds and oil into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add garam masala, curry powder, vegetable stock paste, tomato paste. Insert simmering basket, weigh in lentils, remove simmering basket and rinse lentils under cold water. Remove lentils from simmering basket, add to mixing bowl and sauté <b>3 min/250°F//speed 1<b>.
Add eggplant and water and cook <b>6 min/212°F//speed 1.5<b>.
Add tomatoes and coconut milk and cook <b>6 min/212°F//speed 1<b>.
Add spinach, stir with spatula, and transfer to a serving bowl. Season with salt and garnish with reserved cilantro. Serve hot.

hintsAndTricks: Wash vegetables and herbs before use.
